plot: Nombre Original: Fuk sau che chi seiDirector: Ching-Po WongActores: Juno Mak, Sola Aoi and Siu-hou ChinGrocery store clerk Kit's world is shaken to the core after his girlfriend Wing is brutally raped by a demonic cop. Kit then seeks out revenge.
title: Revenge a love story
